attributes.action: Parliamentary Reform Now - and a GE by the people's will.
attributes.background:
Parliament refuses the people's will, circumvents the law, creates painful delay and makes our country ungovernable.  

You show no duty of care and have damaged our country's reputation. You are making the people suffer. 
You've become dysfunctional and don't represent us.   

The UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to reform Parliament. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
